[1] Basic net earnings per common share and Diluted net earnings per common share are calculated on Net earnings attributable to Procter & Gamble. [2] Basic net earnings per common share and Diluted net earnings per common share are calculated on Net earnings/(loss) attributable to Procter & Gamble. [3] Diluted net earnings per share is calculated on Net earnings attributable to Procter & Gamble.
